alert.note: Alert for Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Spokane Area; Washington Palouse (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 11 at 3:05AM PST until November 11 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 10 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Rosalia, Alpowa Summit, Clarkston, Tekoa, Cheney, Colfax, La Crosse, Oakesdale, Rockford, Fairfield, Davenport, Uniontown, Pomeroy, Spokane Valley, Airway Heights, Pullman, and Downtown Spokane. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 10 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Isolated to scattered power outages. Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Lower Garfield and Asotin Counties; Spokane Area; Washington Palouse
